content: Hello! I hope you’re doing well today. May I please have your full name, including both your first and last name, for the antenatal visit form?
Thank you. Could you please provide your full address, including your specific place of residence?
It’s, um…  Flat 302, Sri Venkateshwara Nilaya, near Hanuman Temple, Indiranagar.
Thank you. Could you share your 10-digit telephone number, please?
Can we skip that for now?  I’m not comfortable…
That’s absolutely okay. Whenever you feel comfortable, you can provide your telephone number. If you’d prefer, we can continue or revisit this question later.
Okay…  it’s plus nine one, nine eight triple three, forty-seven twenty-nine zero.
